title: Hungry Girl Sheet Pan Cookbook: One-Pan Wonders Under 400 Calories
description: One-Pan Wonders Under 400 Calories! Get sheet smart with this essential recipe collection centered around a kitchen MVP― a simple baking sheet! With an emphasis on wholesome ingredients like fresh produce and lean proteins, these delicious, easy meals and more make healthy eating a breeze. Get ready for . . . The Best Protein-packed “Flattatas,” make-ahead pancake bars, and beyond. Lunches & Meatloaves, chicken entrées, low-carb pizzas & more! Savory Snacks & Everything from party foods (bell pepper nachos and pepperoni pizza bites) to flavorful roasted veggies for every meal. Sweet Cool & creamy frozen yogurt bark, decadent yet light brownie crisps . . . even sheet pan apple pie! Featuring . . . 5-ingredient recipes, 30-minute meals, vegetarian recipes, and loads of gluten-free options! Bonus! Sheet pan basics, time-saving tips, shopping tricks, ideas for leftovers . . . What can’t this book do for you? Grab a sheet pan and your appetite― these tasty recipes make eating smart astonishingly easy!
author: Lisa Lillien
